title: The King Of Egypt
description: In a time of war... power, pride and betrayal reign. Love can only hope.Raised a warrior, Tigris, crowned Nitiqreti, is the first female pharaoh. With a beauty that can bring men to their knees and a power that reaps respect from her army, she is prepared to take on any enemy. But when a self-proclaimed king threatens to conquer her throne, Tigris is ready to declare war but could never be ready for what is about to unfold....
author: J.J. Makins
